rules_text: Whenever Ulvenwald Champion deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters, transform Ulvenwald Champion.
rules_text2:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a +1/+1 counter from Decrepit Werewolf. If you can't, transform Decrepit Werewolf.
